name: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Patricia BALLNER.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Patricia BALLNER.
casebody.head_matter:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Patricia BALLNER.
No. D-2913.
Supreme Court of the United States
July 18, 2016.
Patrica Ballner, of New York, New York, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring her to show cause why she should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
